helicopterbattle

Class MovingBackground

  • java.lang.Object
    • helicopterbattle.MovingBackground

  • public class MovingBackground
extends java.lang.Object
    Moving background image. Move the image left or right in a loop.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovingBackground()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MovingBackground

        public MovingBackground()

    • Method Detail

      • Initialize

        public void Initialize(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
              double speed,
              int yPosition)
        Initialize object for moving image.
        Parameters:
        image - Image that will be moving.
        speed - How fast and into which direction should the image move? If number is negative, image will move into left. If you use decimal number, in some cases image can cover one over another at the end point, or could be spaces between images, so try another number.
        yPosition - y coordinate of the image.

      • Draw

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draw images to the screen.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D
